p: Sghaier et al. [ 57] developed a GCÃ—GC method to resolve and quantify the main off-flavour compounds (1-penten-3-one, 1-octen-3-one, ( Z)-4-heptenal, ( E,Z)-2,6-nonadienal, ( E,Z)-2,4-heptadienal, and ( E,Z,Z)-2,4,7-decatrienal) responsible for the fishy-odour in rapeseed oil after thermal treatment. This allowed a two-fold increase in the number of identified compounds compared to classical one-dimensional analysis, based on improved separation.
